EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You at the University Business Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Recently, Wright Express sponsored a webinar through University Business entitled "Practical Applications of ePayments on Campus." Presenters reviewed new research and recent ePayables trends in the higher education sector, described the dynamics leading to increased adoption of ePayment programs by both buyers and suppliers, and offered some best practices for organizations considering ePayable solutions. For your convenience, a recording of the webinar is available at: http://www.universitybusiness.com/webseminar/practical-applications-e-payments-campus .
Wright Express’ ePayments solution – AP Direct – is a no-cost, bank to bank transfer of funds that delivers money to your bottom line. Even better—it integrates directly into your existing ERP system.
Key Benefits:
* Maximize financial incentives—think cash back—while paying your bills electronically * Improve working capital—pay your vendors faster and pay us later * Reduce cycle time and costs associated with paper checks * Improve your team’s efficiency with automated reconciliations
Wright Express is the only commercially chartered bank fully dedicated to addressing your business to business payment needs. As such, you can expect continued investment in solutions, consultations and services to meet your needs.
I would appreciate an opportunity to discuss any questions you may have about AP Direct or Wright Express. Would next week work for you? In addition, I have attached some additional materials for your review.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Cell - {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email}
www.wrightexpress.com/education
